remarks: The coefficient vector of multiplication in the univariate power series ring.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Mar-2015.)
statement:
coe1mul2.s $e |- S = ( PwSer1 ` R ) $.
coe1mul2.t $e |- .xb = ( .r ` S ) $.
coe1mul2.u $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
coe1mul2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
coe1mul2 $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ F e. B /\ G e. B ) -> ( coe1 ` ( F .xb G ) ) = ( k e. NN0 |-> ( R gsum ( x e. ( 0 ... k ) |-> ( ( ( coe1 ` F ) ` x ) .x. ( ( coe1 ` G ) ` ( k - x ) ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d .x. k x $.
$d .xb k $.
$d B k x $.
$d F k x $.
$d G k x $.
$d R k x $.
